channel.title: Blogs on LILLIAN LIU
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on LILLIAN LIU

item.title: ISEA Hackweek - Advances AI for Education Analytics
item.description: Excited to share that I recently completed a transformative Hackweek as part of the ISEA (Innovation Science for Education Analytics) program, which I’ve been fortunate to be a part of for the last six months.

item.title: Does Student Confidence in STEM Courses Lead to Better Performance?
item.description: STEM education is crucial, but many students struggle to find a personal connection to science, leading to a lack of motivation in STEM-related studies (Franks and Capraro, 2019).
